DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine effective safe Ispinesib treat locally advanced metastatic Non-small Cell Lung cancer patient receive platinum-based chemotherapy whose disease continue progress . Treatment involve 1-hr treatment give intravenously ( IV ) , repeat every 21 day . A patient may continue treatment long benefiting treatment . Blood sample take specific time 24 hr period measure amount drug body specific time drug give . Blood sample also take routine lab test complete blood count clinical chemistry . Physical exam perform treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Ispinesib In Patients With Advanced Or Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Must receive one prior platinumbased chemotherapy regimen . Blood test do check blood count adequate take part study . Received 1 chemotherapy regimen past less adequate liver kidney function . Females pregnant . Any unstable , preexist major medical condition history cancer . Have receive investigational drug , chemotherapy , radiation treatment surgery within 28 day prior enter study .
